## Task

Turn evaluation findings into GitHub Issue drafts.

## Input I will provide

- A section of an evaluation report (especially the Actions section)
- Any constraints (timebox, scope)

## Output

Return a list of issue drafts with:

- Title
- Suggested labels
- Definition of Done (checkboxes)
- Validation command(s) or evaluation step

## Constraints

- Each issue should be 0.5â€“2 hours.
- Prefer changes that improve evaluation metrics or reduce ambiguity in spec/plan.
